page.title: 17VILLAGE CHANGES SINCE 1900
page.content: 5a.{SHOPPING HABITS.} {FOOD.}LOCALLY-23, WORCESTER-23, TENBURY-4,KIDDERMINSTER-31, STOURPORT-41, ELSEWHERE-15. {OTHER KINDS OF SHOPPING.} LOCALLY-2, WORCESTER-54, TENBURY-3, KIDDERMINSTER-41, STOURPORT-31, ELSEWHERE-16. {DELIVERIES TO THE HOME.} MILK=92% BREAD-36% NEWSPAPERS-61% ALthough the small SUPER MARKET in ABBERLEY now caters for the FOOD needs of a number of homes,people are generally more attracted to the large shops and stores of the nearby towns. Noting the transport section of the questionnaire,travel to the neighbouring towns is made easy.Few homes now have to rely on the country buses. 5b{SOCIAL HABITS.} Out of the 100 questionnaires,46homes
